usage: Strength training and weight workouts at home or in small fitness spaces, using multiple dumbbell weights organized on a compact stand.
key_features: Steel dumbbells with chrome/silver ends and black handles
Includes a compact black rack/stand with three tiers
Printed weight marking on each dumbbell end (2, 2.5, 3)
Package details: 15kg (2kg + 2.5kg + 3kg pair), steel dumbbell with stand
ai_description: A sleek dumbbell set featuring three chrome steel pairs marked 2, 2.5 and 3, each with black handles, neatly arranged on a compact black plastic stand. The tiered rack cradles the shiny round dumbbell heads on both sides, creating an organized, space-saving weight setup.
target_audience: Home fitness users, beginners to intermediate lifters, and anyone needing a compact dumbbell set with stand for strength training.
product_name: KAKSS Supreme Quality Steel Dumbbell With Stand (15kg(2kg+2.5kg+3kg Pair))
